thread.title: Are Separate Bank Accounts Fair for Couples?
thread.title_full: Are Separate Bank Accounts Fair for Couples?

title: Are Separate Bank Accounts Fair for Couples?
text:
Are Separate Bank Accounts Fair for Couples? By Share If a couple agrees to split expenses but one person works part-time, is it fair to keep separate bank accounts? Moneyologist Quentin Fottrell discusses. Photo: Getty Posted September 25, 2015 Back to Top
